name: Polka Scape
description:
(pc only)

[Escape puzzle game of the type often seen in advertisements]

Finally came out!

The type of escape puzzle game that someone has been waiting for often seen in advertisements

Polka Omaru  fan art game!!

Pull out the pin and deliver the key to the escape door to Polka!

However, if you hit something else, Polka will be in a bad mood!

It's up to you whether she can escape ... good luck ...!!!!

* If the evaluation is good, I will make a sequel.

[Material]

ＢＧＭ：THE・クイズマン
